channel.title: AstralPk - New server - uprising community - seeking staff - Join now!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/b3o2zc.png[/img] Hello and welcome to AstralPk!
Forums: [URL=http://www.astralpk.com/forums/index.php]AstralPK Forum[/URL] Client Download: [URL=https://www.dropbox.com/s/rs8tuzkl2drt95m/Astralpkclient.jar]Download client[/URL] Webclient is comming soon.
First day we already have 4 active players and 150 registered users! [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/9iscaf.png[/img]
Features. A Tutorial Guide 12+ Bosses Lottery System Perfect skills 15+ Mini-Games 5 different quest All pk armours with effects All barrows items with effects PvP Target System UserTitles Summoning with specials, pouches, and scrolls Jad with all waves (63) Elite Clues A unique jail system All Armour's with correct effects Stable economy Clan chat w/ lootshare Full Mantling Dedicated Server Some Customs a dedicated development team and many more come see yourself![/CENTER]
[spoiler=Pictures of AstralPk.][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/1jrnv8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/27ysgg3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/dw2736.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2c0cwx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2mdncs3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/fbmamg.png[/img][/spoiler]
